code: import{Autocomplete,useLoadScript}from'@react-google-maps/api';import{useRef}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const libraries=['places'];export default function AddressAutocomplete(_ref){let{value,onChange}=_ref;const{isLoaded,loadError}=useLoadScript({googleMapsApiKey:process.env.REACT_APP_GOOGLE_MAPS_API_KEY,libraries});const autocompleteRef=useRef(null);const handlePlaceChanged=()=>{const place=autocompleteRef.current.getPlace();const address=place===null||place===void 0?void 0:place.formatted_address;if(address){onChange(address);localStorage.setItem('deliveryAddress',address);}};if(loadError){console.error('Google Maps failed to load:',loadError);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:value,onChange:e=>onChange(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter your address",style:inputStyles});}if(!isLoaded)return null;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Autocomplete,{onLoad:auto=>{autocompleteRef.current=auto;},onPlaceChanged:handlePlaceChanged,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:value,onChange:e=>onChange(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter your address",style:inputStyles})});}const inputStyles={marginBottom:'12px',maxWidth:'480px',background:'#fff',padding:'8px',borderRadius:'6px',boxShadow:'0 0 0 1px #ccc',border:'1px solid #ccc'};
